Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to lithium-ion battery safety resources for limited use motorcycles
Summary: Changes instances of the term moped to limited use motorcycle in relation to lithium-ion battery safety.
LawCode: Ren ยง399-nnn to be ยง495-c, amd ยง495-c, Gen Bus L (as proposed in ยง8743 & A.9338)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the development of safety resources, information and protocols for lithium-ion batteries
